summary: This document is a suicide watch and psychological observation update regarding Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019 - the day he was found dead in his cell. It includes a forensic psychologist's assessment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the suicide watch and psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Suicide Watch/Psychological Observation Update
events.description: A suicide watch and psychological observation update was issued for Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A suicide watch and psychological observation update was issued for Jeffrey Epstein on August 9, 2019.
The document was created by a forensic psychologist with the United States Public Health Service.
Epstein was being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at the time.
This document was created on the same day Epstein was found dead in his cell.
